summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of West Roy Street, from Second Avenue West to Third Avenue West, and Third Avenue West, from West Roy Street to Olympic Place, all in The City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon and providing for the necessary surface drainage, in accordance with Resolution No. 1863 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
